description: Dr Sonia Malik has impressed us .she is just pure amazing.she listens and she tries to solve your problems.if you are looking for such professional gynecologist you must visit Dr Sonia Malik. Thank you Dr Sonia for your counselling and support.

description: A special thanks to my gynaecologist,Dr Sonia . I had some gynec issues she handled it so well and guided me throughout.she was always positive in her approach and helped me steer.

description: I have been visiting to Dr Sonia Malik for some of my treatment.acc to my experience she is the best doctor.not only a great gynecologist but also upbeat and caring.i highly recommend.

name: Verified Patient
title: Visited For PCOD/PCOS Treatment
description: Dr. Sonia, I want to express my sincere appreciation for the exceptional care and professionalism you demonstrated during my recent visit.
